Key Match Events: Dejounte Murray scored the team-best 29 points
Willie Green did not indicate whether Zion Williamson would be available for the next game
Post-Match Reflections: Zion Williamson returned from a two-month absence and scored 22 points in 28 minutes
The Pelicans hosted the Minnesota Timberwolves and lost 104-97
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Pelicans are set to host Portland on Wednesday at 7 p.m.
The Pelicans will submit their injury report by 1 p.m. to confirm Zion Williamson's availability for the next game
